name: Greater Rakshasa
description: A malevolent fiend known for its physical prowess and powerful magical abilities, possessing high Dexterity and Charisma.
memorable: With potent charm spells and the ability to remain undetected by lower-level magic, it is a master manipulator in any encounter.
goals: To deceive, manipulate, and exert control over others.
relations: Often serves as an antagonist, working alongside other fiends or dark entities.
environment: Typically found in urban areas where it can blend in and manipulate others.
strengths: Possesses damage immunities to non-magical attacks and can exploit magic effects safely due to its Limited Magic Immunity.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to piercing damage from magical weapons wielded by good creatures.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with claws that can curse its targets, preventing them from benefiting from rests.
most_powerful_ability: Harrowing Visions creates horrific illusions that can inflict significant psychic damage and frighten enemies.
skills: Excels in Deception and Insight, making it adept at manipulating others and understanding their motivations.
additional_information: Can target multiple creatures with charm spells through Puppet Master ability.
Innate spellcasting allows it to cast spells without material components.
Uses illusions and invisibility to confuse and control opponents.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting includes various utility and charm spells, with high versatility in combat.
test_queries: fiend that manipulates with charm spells
cunning magical monster with psychic attacks
evil fiend capable of controlling minds
